title.span: Manual for Javier to Better Take Care of Himself

shortdesc.p: According to his persona, Javier is a Virginia Tech transfer student from Richmond, VA. He is 20-years-old, and is in need of taking care of himself. Included in this manual are three steps that will help him achieve this.

topic.title: How to Make a Tomato Omelette

shortdesc.p: Make a healthy omelette for breakfast.
Change the filter in a Brita pitcher.

topic.title: How to Find a Decent Vacuum to Purchase Online

shortdesc.p: Find a decent vacuum online to purchase for residential area.
